And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H1980>Go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%> So he <S%H1980>departed<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> him a little <S%H3530>way.<s%> <S%H776><s%>
